title: RT News - October 10, 2019 (12:00 MSK)
text: Turkey has moved into the second day of its military operation against Kurdish militants in Syria, while thousands of civilians keep fleeing their homes. In Ecuador, after a week of violence, anti-austerity protesters try to paralyze the country by calling a nationwide general strike. Germany's interior minister says the deadly shootings in the city of Halle that left two dead, were driven by anti-Semitism. Britain's former spy chief says private-sector Internet firms know more about us than any intelligence agency. And pose a major threat to democracy.
description: Turkey has moved into the second day of its military operation against Kurdish militants in Syria, while thousands of civilians keep fleeing their homes
